attributes.action: ensure England fans can watch the National football team
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England Football fans request that the Government and the FA ensure that from this day forward  all England international mens football matches are shown on either a terrestrial or satellite television platform and not via internet streaming to ensure that the maximum number of England football fans can continue to support the National team playing the game that we gave to the world!! Come on England!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
